title: Empty State - Empty State Message
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the mini scoreboard when there are no games for that day
custom_expected: THEN the no games empty state message is displayed

title: Empty State - Spanish Empty State Message
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the mini scoreboard when there are no games for that day
custom_expected: THEN the spanish no games empty state message is displayed

title: Free Game of the Day - Free Game Label
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects a mini scoreboard game that is the free game of the day

custom_steps: WHEN user inspects a mini scoreboard game that is the free game of the day
